pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Michelle Bachelet of Chile | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today the Prime Minister spoke by phone with the President of Chile, Michelle Bachelet. The two leaders exchanged views on trade issues of mutual interest, including advancing a progressive trade agenda.

Both leaders underlined the close and productive bilateral relationship between Canada and Chile, with Prime Minister Trudeau taking the opportunity to thank President Bachelet for their excellent collaboration during her second term in office.
